name: miso.distil
body:
To update the DISTIL feature just add this link to yout "install new software" option in Eclipse
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carras91/miso.distil/master/updateSite/site.xml

MetaModel of DISTIL language:
![DISTIL MetaModel](http://s2.subirimagenes.com/imagen/previo/thump_9428671metamodel.png)

Examples

Bento - https://miso-distil-bento.herokuapp.com/
JavaDoc - 

FileServer - https://miso-distil-fileserver.herokuapp.com/
JavaDoc -
